Do values in a numeric vector fall in specified range?

Source: R/between.R
between.Rd

This is a shortcut for x >= left & x <= right.

Usage

between(x, left, right)

Arguments

x

A numeric vector of values.

left, right

Boundary values.

Value

A logical vector the same length as x.

Examples

between(1:12, 7, 9)
#>  [1] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE

x <- rnorm(1e2)
x[between(x, -1, 1)]
#>  [1]  0.19943663 -0.96896203  0.80243608 -0.61581181  0.54845569 -0.02326775
#>  [7] -0.05514100  0.11484541 -0.31897733 -0.79522290  0.42892981 -0.56494553
